title: Where does the former Myrtle Grove Volunteer Fire Department plan to spend all the money it is requesting from the county?
text:
The question is moot since the county has said it is finished
negotiating with the fire department and no deal was reached. Here's
a link to the latest story from StarNewsOnline.com:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100930/ARTICLES/100939955
